keyMoments.title: Nola's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The giant python Nola emerges from the forest of Upper Yard, revealing itself as a massive serpent over 200 meters long that has lived for more than 400 years.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the oldest living beings in One Piece and a creature with deep connections to the Noland-Kalgara history.

keyMoments.title: Nola Attacks the Exploration Team
keyMoments.description: Nola attacks the Straw Hat exploration team with incredible speed, attempting to swallow them whole and forcing them to scatter across Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: This attack separates the crew and sets up individual encounters throughout the Survival Game.

abilities.description: Nola possesses incredible size (over 200 meters) and can swallow humans and buildings whole.
Nola's fangs deliver potent venom capable of instantly corroding trees.
Despite its massive size, Nola can move and strike with surprising speed.

relationships.description: Nola was befriended by Mont Blanc Noland over 400 years ago and was named after him by the Shandia.

evolutionMoments.description: Nola's historical connection to Noland is established through the backstory.

relationships.description: Nola was also close friends with the Shandia warrior Kalgara 400 years ago.

evolutionMoments.description: Nola's connection to Kalgara is established as part of the historical context.

reveals.information: Nola is over 400 years old and was named after Mont Blanc Noland
Known as the Master of the Sky in Upper Yard
Offspring of the snake god Kashigami that Noland and Kalgara killed

keyMoments.title: Shandia Chief Appears
keyMoments.description: The Shandia Chief makes his first appearance as the wise and elderly leader of the Shandia tribe, shown guiding his people in their ongoing struggle.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the leader who has kept the Shandia's history and purpose alive through generations of conflict.

relationships.description: The Chief is Wyper's leader and told him stories about their ancestor Kalgara when he was young.

evolutionMoments.description: The Chief is shown as the leader and elder guiding the Shandia warriors.

reveals.information: Leader of the Shandia tribe and keeper of their history
Depicted as peaceful, honorable, and wise enough to make crucial decisions for his people

keyMoments.title: Isa's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Isa, a Shandia woman and mother of Aisa, appears in conversation with Raki, discussing Aisa and Wyper. She is characterized as a caring and concerned mother.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Aisa's mother and adds depth to the Shandia community by showing family relationships and the human cost of the ongoing war.

relationships.description: Isa is Aisa's mother and is very caring and protective of her daughter.

evolutionMoments.description: Isa is introduced as Aisa's mother, showing concern for her daughter.

reveals.information: Mother of Aisa, a Shandia woman
Very caring mother concerned about her daughter's safety

keyMoments.title: Gan Fall Recounts the Shandia War History
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall provides crucial exposition about the 400-year war between the Shandia and Sky Islanders, explaining how the Shandia were displaced from their homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the Straw Hats and audience with essential context for understanding the Skypiea conflict and sets up the Noland-Kalgara flashback.
keyMoments.quote: The Shandia were the original inhabitants of Upper Yard. They were driven out of their land and the Sky Islanders possessed it for selfish interest.

keyMoments.title: Gan Fall Explains Enel's Takeover
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall reveals how Enel arrived six years ago and took control of Skypiea, explaining the current political situation.
keyMoments.significance: Clarifies the three-way conflict between Enel's forces, the Shandia, and the Sky Islanders.
keyMoments.quote: Enel arrived on Skypiea six years ago, with his priests.

reveals.information: Detailed knowledge of the 400-year history between Shandia and Sky Islanders
Information about Enel's arrival and takeover six years ago

keyMoments.title: Wyper Leads Warriors to Battle
keyMoments.description: Wyper rallies the Shandia warriors and makes the decision to march on Upper Yard to defeat Enel and reclaim their homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Sets in motion the Shandia's assault that will converge with the Straw Hats' activities in the Survival Game.
